meanings: (휴식을 취하다) rest, relax, have[take] a rest, take a break, take time off, (informal) kick back
(일을) be out of work,, (휴가를 얻어서) take (a day) off, (일자리가 없어서) be unemployed, be in between jobs

vlive.korean: 나는 원래 그냥 숨만 쉬어도 귀엽다 - 아니! You're cute when you just breathe. - No way! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [AB6IX] 섹시파티와 섹시장아찌 앞에서 그 누구도 섹시를 논하지 말 것 (Daejeon line talking about sexy)
vlive.english: You're cute when you just breathe. - No way!

vlive.korean: 나는 원래 숨만 쉬어도 귀엽다 - 아니 아니! I'm just cute even if I just breathe. - No, no! 듣기 View video AB6IX : 심심한 대전즈🥰❤
vlive.english: I'm just cute even if I just breathe. - No, no!

vlive.korean: [젠득 보는 삶 평생 대유잼 숨만 쉬어도 웃다가 심장터져] 그거 이제 좀 재미 없지 않아요? [I feel like having a heart attack, laughing so hard just by watching you breathe] Is it still fun? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [2년 전 오늘의 BLACKPINK] 머리띠 천사 젠츄보고 천국 시민권 땄잖아요💕 (JISOO&JENNIE's headband show 2years ago)
vlive.english: [I feel like having a heart attack, laughing so hard just by watching you breathe] Is it still fun?

vlive.korean: 좀 쉬어도 돼요? Can I take a break? 듣기 View video Dispatch : '째알 하고 싶은 거 다해' ...'NU'EST W' JR HD photo sketch
그러면 쉬어도 되는 거지? Then can we rest? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]ONF's SUMMER VACATION WEEK - 온앤오프 X 여름방학 스페셜위크

examples.korean: She asked her boss whether she could have the day off. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 사장에게 그 날 하루를 쉬어도 되겠는지 물어 보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She asked her boss whether she could have the day off. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’ll ask my boss if I can have the day off. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 하루 쉬어도 될지 내 상사에게 물어 볼게. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ll ask my boss if I can have the day off. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I think you deserve a rest. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 넌 좀 쉬어도 될 것 같은데. Neungyule
examples.english: I think you deserve a rest. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: May I take the day off tomorrow? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내일 하루 쉬어도 될까요? Neungyule

examples.korean: The boss said I could take Monday off! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사장님이 월요일에 쉬어도 된다고 하셨다! Neungyule
